name: Enemy Controller
desc:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.
● Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.
str1: Change the Battle Position of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls
str2: Tribute 1 monster. Select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. Take control of it until the End Phase
